data.actual_result: It does return to the first unread message but it continues to scroll up
data.expected_result: It returns to the position where the first unread message was and stops scrolling
data.short_description: Tapping the new messages banner doesn't stop scroll
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a channel with unread messages and with a long message history - Swipe your finger down and release it to make it scroll up with inertia - While the screen is moving, tap the new messages banner
